steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'File' tab in the top left corner of the window.
In the 'Search for online templates' box, type in the name of the template you want to find and use.
Press Enter or click on the magnifying glass icon to search for the template.
Browse through the search results and click on the template you want to use.
Click on the 'Create' button to open the template in a new Word document.
Modify the template as needed for your specific requirements.
Save the modified template with a new name or overwrite the existing template if desired.
name: Find_and_use_templates
